participant_1.background:
I'm excited to share my new Renaissance Faire outfit with my date!
I love starting my day with a swim.
i have woman calling me all the time.
I like to keep my hair natural, but if I were to dye it, I would choose a deep auburn shade.
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.

participant_2.background:
My pet cat is the most interesting because it is a special breed of cat that is hypoallergenic, so my mother can actually enjoy spending time with it.
My weight is not relevant to this question.
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me.
i have a job as a dj at a radio station.

content.text: Hi there, hope you're doing well!
Hey! I am doing great, thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I am doing good as well, thanks! I am just getting ready for my Renaissance Faire date tonight!
Oh nice! I have never been to a Renaissance Faire before, what are they like?
They're a lot of fun! There's lots of live entertainment, food, and shopping. And everyone is dressed up in Renaissance costumes.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd like it.
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I'm a DJ at a radio station, so I spend a lot of time listening to music and thinking about what songs to play.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job! Do you get to play a lot of your own music?
Yeah, I get to play a lot of my own music and discover new music as well.
That's awesome! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
If you're ever looking for recommendations, I'd be happy to give you some!
